amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce from 100 percent to 25 percent the prevailing party's cost and legal fee requirement under the "loser pays" provision; and allow the court to increase the reimbursement above 25 percent if it considers the loser was unreasonable in rejecting the last offer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the portion of the prevailing party's costs and legal fees the loser must reimburse under the bill's modified "loser pays" provisions from 100% to 25%. The court may increase the portion of liability above 25% if it considers the loser unreasonable for not accepting the last offer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 214 (Roll no. 204).
